snippet.title: Pocket Kingdom: Own The World (2004) - Nokia N-Gage Gameplay
snippet.description:
The Map of Ulgress is in absolute chaos and advancing forces threaten the peace of your modest Pocket Kingdom! With only a handful of loot and a few trusted advisors, you must gather an army…

With Pocket Kingdom, massively multiplayer online (MMO) games are going mobile! MMO game worlds constantly grow and change, even when you're not playing. Just imagine your hard-earned kingdom sitting there, an irresistible temptation for some enterprising player halfway across the world. Pocket Kingdom gives you the best kind of enemies there are: real ones! And now you don't have to chain yourself to a desktop computer to get in on the action.
